column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Female guard says : " Get him off me and arrest him ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " You 're under arrest !
#Text=I never thought I 'd find you in here , Prince Zuko .
#Text=" Zuko says : " How did you know who I am ?
#Text=" Warden says : " How could I not ?
#Text=You broke my niece 's heart .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You 're Mai 's uncle ?
#Text=I never meant to hurt her .
#Text=" Warden says : " Quiet !
#Text=You 're my special prisoner now .
#Text=And you 'd best behave .
#Text=If these criminals found out who you are , the traitor prince who let his nation down , why they 'd tear you to shreds .
#Text=" Zuko says : " So what 's in it for you ?
#Text=Why do n't you just tell my father to come collect a reward ?
#Text=" Warden says : " Oh , in due time , believe me , I intend to collect .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , good , you guys have met .
#Text=" Suki says : " Actually , we met a long time ago .
#Text=" Zuko says : " We did ?
#Text=" Suki says : " Yeah , you kind of burned down my village .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Oh , sorry about that .
#Text=Nice to see you again .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , listen , I think I have an escape plan .
#Text=I checked out the coolers again , and the point of them is to keep firebenders contained , right ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah ... " Sokka says : " So , they 're completely insulated and sealed to keep the cold in .
#Text=Well , to keep the cold in , it also has to keep the heat out , right ?
#Text=" Suki says : " Just get to the point , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's a perfect boat for getting through the boiling water .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The cooler as a boat ?
#Text=Are you sure ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm telling you , it 'll work .
#Text=I walked around the perimeter .
#Text=There 's a blind spot between two guard towers .
#Text=It 's the perfect launching point .
#Text=I already tested it out .
#Text=We 'll roll the cooler into the water and just float with the current .
#Text=It 'll take us straight across .
#Text=As long as we do n't make a sound , no one will notice .
#Text=And bing - bang - boom , we 're home free .
#Text=" Suki says : " But how are you going to get the cooler out ?
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Yeah , how are you going to get the cooler out ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=We did n't ... w - we did n't say that .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah , you heard wrong .
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " I heard you hatching an escape plan , and I want in .
#Text=" Zuko says : " There 's nothing to get in on .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , the only thing we 're hatching is ... an egg ?
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Okay , well , I come with you or the warden hears about this egg , too .
#Text=" Suki says : " I guess we have no choice .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Okay , you 're in .
#Text=Now first we need someone to unbolt the cooler , from the inside .
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Oh , I can get you inside .
#Text="
